name: Hide and Half-Light (Demo)
description:
Howdy!
This is Hide and Half-Light, in development and a lil goofy.
Features the opening exhibition on Flying Fruit Cats.
Track used is Autumn Forest by Adrian von Ziegler.

Controls:
WASD to move
Mouse to look
Z to read signs if you're in range
X to cue animation at the top of the stairs
Space to enter main scene, space to return to main menu. Press it just once and wait for the scene to load.

Hope you enjoy!
Feedback welcomed.
20.10.2017
